name: About Cinema Scouter
description:
Welcome to Cinema Scouter, your go-to website for finding movie theaters near you, discovering what movies they're playing, and checking showTimes for the latest releases! We are dedicated to providing you with an easy-to-use platform that helps you explore and enjoy the world of cinema.


Our Mission:

At Cinema Scouter, our mission is to connect movie enthusiasts with the best cinematic experiences. We aim to provide comprehensive and up-to-date data regarding movie theaters, movies, and showTimes, making it convenient for you to find the information you need quickly and accurately.


User-Friendly Features

Cinema Scouter is designed with a user-friendly interface that allows you to easily browse and find movie theaters and movies based on your preferences. You can save your favorite theaters and even purchase tickets directly through our platform. We strive to continually improve our features and functionality to provide you with the best user experience possible.


Trustworthy Information:

We understand the importance of accurate and reliable information when it comes to planning your movie night. Therefore, we diligently curate our data to ensure that the theater and movie information we provide is current and trustworthy. However, please note that movie theater and showtime availability may vary and it's always best to double-check with the theater directly for the most up-to-date information.


Thank you for using Cinema Scouter!

name: Privacy Policy
description:
At Cinema Scouter, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website and our related services (collectively, the "Services"). By using our Services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.


Information We Collect:


Personal Information: We may collect personal information, such as your name and email address, when you voluntarily provide it to us through our contact form or other communication methods.

Location Information: In order to provide you with movie theater recommendations near your location, we may collect your location information, such as your IP address, GPS coordinates, or other similar information.

Usage Information: We may collect usage information, such as the pages you visit on our website, the movies you search for, and the showTimes you view.

Cookies: We may use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your usage of our website and to improve our Services. Cookies are small data files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. You can disable cookies in your web browser settings, but please note that some features of our website may not function properly if you do so.


How We Use Your Information:


To Provide Services: We may use your personal and location information to provide you with movie theater recommendations near your location, movie showTimes, and other related information.

To Improve Our Services: We may use usage information and cookies to analyze how our website is used, to improve the user experience, and to develop new features and functionalities.

To Communicate with You: We may use your personal information to respond to your inquiries, provide customer support, and send you updates and notifications about our Services.

To Protect Our Rights: We may use your information to enforce our Terms of Service, protect our rights, or comply with legal requirements.


Information Sharing:


We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for their marketing purposes without your consent. We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in providing our Services, such as hosting providers, analytics providers, and communication tools. These service providers are contractually bound to only use your information for the purpose of providing the Services and are prohibited from using your information for any other purpose.

We may also share your information if required by law, in response to a legal process, or to protect our rights or the rights of others.


Data Security:


We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, misuse, or alteration. However, please be aware that no security measure is perfect and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.


Last updated: April 6, 2023.

name: California Notice
description:
If you are a California resident, you have the right to request certain information regarding the collection and use of your personal information by Cinema Scouter, including:


The categories of personal information we have collected about you.

The categories of sources from which we have collected your personal information.

The business or commercial purpose for which we have collected or disclosed your personal information.

The categories of third parties with whom we have shared your personal information.

The specific pieces of personal information we have collected about you.

You also have the right to request the deletion of your personal information, subject to certain exceptions under the CCPA.


How to Exercise Your California Privacy Rights:


To exercise your rights under the CCPA, you may submit a verifiable consumer request by contacting us at [email address] or through our contact form on our website. We will verify your request using information we have on file, which may include asking you to provide additional information to confirm your identity.


Updates to this Notice:


We may update this California Privacy Rights Notice from time to time to comply with legal requirements or to reflect changes in our privacy practices. We encourage you to review this notice periodically for any changes.


Last updated: April 6, 2023.

name: Accessability
description:
At Cinema Scouter, we are committed to providing a website that is accessible to all individuals, including those with disabilities. We strive to ensure that our website complies with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 level AA standards, which have been established to make web content more accessible to people with disabilities.


We have taken the following measures to enhance the accessibility of our movie theater showtime website:


Alternative Text: We have added alternative text (alt text) to all meaningful images on our website. This helps users with visual impairments to understand the content of the images.

Captioned Videos: Videos on our website are captioned, ensuring that users who are deaf or hard of hearing can access the video content.

Descriptive Links: We use descriptive and meaningful hyperlink text, so that users with screen readers can understand the context of the link without having to click on it.


Ongoing Accessibility Efforts:


We are continually working to improve the accessibility of our website. Our team is committed to monitoring and testing our website to ensure that it remains accessible to all users, and we are actively seeking feedback from our users on how we can further improve the accessibility of our website.


Contact Us:


If you have any questions, feedback, or concerns regarding the accessibility of our movie theater showtime website, or if you encounter any accessibility issues while using our website, please contact us. We value your input and will make every effort to address your concerns in a timely manner.

We are committed to providing an inclusive online experience for all users, and we will continue to strive for accessibility excellence in accordance with WCAG 2.1 level AA standards. Thank you for choosing Cinema Scouter.
